resources.string: Welcome to Snakes and Ladders!\nPress the button below to roll the dice.

Each player will roll the dice.
The dice can roll a maximum of 12. 
Whatever square you land on may have a snake or a ladder. 

If you are bit by a snake, you will move backwards, till you 
land on the square where it's tail is. 
If you reach a ladder, you will move forwards, till you land 
on the square where the ladder ends. 

At any point, a player may choose to quit the game by clicking on the Quit game button
